spell.name: Guard and Seal
spell.targets: 1 item of light bulk or less

duration.entry: until your next daily preparation or the target moves more than 15 feet

entries: You draw upon your powers of warding to guard the presence of the target. You can apply any number of the following effects to the target:

items: The target object becomes invisible, as per the Invisible Item spell.
You are alerted when the target is touched or moved. A creature aware of the spell must succeed at a Stealth check against the spell's DC to prevent the alert.
The target, and all its contents, appears as non-magical. GM rolls a secret counteract check when an equal or higher level detection spell would affect the target.

dragonmark.lesser: You can target an item of 1 bulk or less.
dragonmark.greater: You can target an item of 3 bulk. The duration is until you cast Guard and Seal again.
dragonmark.grand: Additional Effect: the target is treated as being behind running water or a thin sheet of lead.
dragonmark.siberys: You can target 10 items of 3 bulk or less or one willing Small creature.
